DOC.brief_summary: This is a prospective study to see whether ultrasonography can predict difficult airway and/or predict obstructive sleep apnea syndrome (OSAS) in children.
DOC.brief_title: Ultrasound to Predict a Pediatric Difficult Airway and Obstructive Sleep Apnea Syndrome in Children
DOC.criteria: Children with known or suspected difficult direct laryngoscopy identified by either ENT or anesthesiologist. Children with difficult tracheal intubation aged 1 month 18 years old Children with obstructive sleep apnea aged 1 year 8 years old Parent/ patient refusal to participate in study
